brands.title: Brands
brands.subtitle: Whether you're a seasoned wine enthusiast or just beginning to explore the world of wine, we have a wine brand that's perfect for you. Join us on a journey of discovery and explore our wine portfolio.

aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.text: At Wine Ventures, our passion for wine flows straight from the tap to your glass. We're not just about wine; we're dedicated to revolutionizing the way you experience it. Our journey takes us Outside the Bottle, where innovation meets tradition, creating a new era of wine appreciation in a convenient and eco-friendly way.

head.title: Wine Ventures - Discover the world of wine by the glass
head.description: Wine Ventures - Wine producer with wine-on-tap systems: brands Dansa and Crime of the Century Premium Wine by the Glass. Lisbon, Portugal.
head.ogDescription: At Wine Ventures, the passion for wine flows straight from the tap to your glass. Our journey takes us Outside the Bottle, where innovation meets tradition, creating a new era of wine appreciation.
